full_text:
THE Q500 MASTER QUALITY PLAN
•A document, expressed as a flow diagram, which reflects current
and future development, training, implementation, sequence, and
measurements of Q500.
•The Q50o Master Quality Plan is the blueprint for quality
improvement. It documents, in some detail, each of the major
activities that Park 500 uses to pursue Q500, a Total Quality
Initiative.
•It is designed to be flexible - it can incorporate delays or
improvements to our schedule - but it is the basic roadmap.
•Sequence of activities is important because it establishes a
foundation upon which each building block rests.
•Without such a plan, it would be impossible to coordinate
training, implementation, and measurement of so many activities
and the efforts of so many people in the organization.
2030706809
A Few Major Components:
· A comprehensive timetable
. Organizational accountabilitiy and review
· Incorporates Reasons For Change and Q5oo Principles
